title: His first climb
brief_description: Begins by showing basic climbing equipment, including boots, helmet, carabiner, chocks and ropes. Shows techniques such as the use of ropes, specific knots and the running relay. Stresses the need for three-point contact with rockface at all times and the necessity for an experienced instructor.
